name: Square and Circle (JUMP + RUN)
description:
Hi All,

This is the third entry in my series of Square and Circle. A very simple objective to use basic shapes and basic mechanics to create several fun and playable games.

As always, this series is open source and the files can be found with the github link below.

For this entry we have combined the two previous game mechanics of Jump and Run to make a crazy fun platformer level.

ENTRY #1: https://github.com/capitalKage/Square-Circle-Jump-

ENTRY #2: https://github.com/capitalKage/Square-and-Circle-Run-

ENTRY #3: https://github.com/capitalKage/Square-and-Circle-JUMP-RUN
